channel.title: Minigame halp
channel.description:
need help
I'm making a custom minigame and i need help
1) i need to make the npcs hit higher and i need to know how to change their combat level 2) i need to know how to make a shop and make the currency wg tokens 3) i need to know how to change the name of wg tokens from "warriors guild token" to "minigame name token" 4) i need to know how to make a player instantly teleport after killing an npc (like gsmini) 5) i need to know how to change an npcs name 6) when a player kills an npc how do i get it to automatically place an item on their account? 7) how do i add items to the store and make it to where you need the tokens to buy stuff?
help pl0x

item.title: Minigame halp
item.dc:creator: @3p1cpkz 3p1cpkz
item.description:
@3p1cpkz wrote:

need help

I’m making a custom minigame and i need help

  1. i need to make the npcs hit higher and i need to know how to change their combat level
  2. i need to know how to make a shop and make the currency wg tokens
  3. i need to know how to change the name of wg tokens from “warriors guild token” to “minigame name token”
  4. i need to know how to make a player instantly teleport after killing an npc (like gsmini)
  5. i need to know how to change an npcs name
  6. when a player kills an npc how do i get it to automatically place an item on their account?
  7. how do i add items to the store and make it to where you need the tokens to buy stuff?

help pl0x

Read full topic
